column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: A foreigner died at his rented room No. 43E1
column5: 2019 at 10:30 am.------Police said that 53 year old Canadian Jason Alan Strachan died of a heart attack caused by high blood pressure.------A Canadian and an Irish* passport  (*although could be British
column6: as he was born in the UK) were recovered
column7: along with some personal items which were sent to the immigration office.------http://kampucheathmey.com/2016/archives/1063651
